TopicTitle: These games that Wargaming has... just ugh!

Articles.Content:
World of tanks is alright, but still it gets pretty bad. Spotting mechanics are bad, spawning is.... I don't even want to. But I have developed memories from it so I can't leave it. But I can certainly leave World of Warplanes.

This game is so bad when compared to War Thunder which is based on realism. I also cannot wait for Ground Forces to come out. That game is bomb.

What do you think about these games? Personally, the game a truly hate is the world of warplanes. All the others I can play.

I loved WT, played it when it first went open beta...

But now its just a really bad P2W.
I agree. I wish it was still like that...
The good old days of 1.27...before it became over-hyped...

The good old days of 1.27...before it became over-hyped...

Hype goes to devs' heads.

(in games with microtransactions) This leads to poor, greedy development decisions.

This leads to lower quality game.

It simply doesn't hold the draw it once did, especially since it seems like they've made realistic too easy for mouse pilots (I'm an x52 pro flyer myself).

Meanwhile, I've got my eggs in Titanfall.
